name: OATH
description: In law, a solemn appeal to the Deity, made binding upon the conscience by a penalty for perjury.

name: OBLIVION
description: The state or condition in which the wicked cease from struggling and the dreary are at rest. Fame's eternal dumping ground. Cold storage for high hopes. A place where ambitious authors meet their works without pride and their betters without envy. A dormitory without an alarm clock.
